name: RanorexRunTestExe
description: Create a build/release task for Azure Pipelines/Team Foundation Server (TFS) that can configure and run Ranorex tests, collect test results, and present these test results and test artifacts in the associated build/release pipeline. Please note that Ranorex licensing supports Self-Hosted Agents only.
helpMarkDown: The Ranorex Test task makes Ranorex more accessible to the Azure DevOps and TFS community. A [self-hosted agent](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/devops/pipelines/agents/v2-windows?view=azure-devops) needs to be used for Ranorex runtime licensing. [Learn More](https://www.ranorex.com/help/latest/interfaces-connectivity/azure-devops-integration/introduction/)
author: RanorexGmbH

inputs.name: testExePath
inputs.label: Test Executable
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path from the repo root to the Ranorex EXE you want to run.

inputs.name: testSuitePath
inputs.label: Ranorex Test Suite
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path from the repo root to the Ranorex RXTST you want to run.

inputs.name: runConfig
inputs.label: Test Run Configuration
inputs.helpMarkDown: Run configuration to use when tests are run.

inputs.name: attachReport
inputs.label: Attach Ranorex Report
inputs.helpMarkDown: If enabled, report will be attached as an artifact to the build results.

inputs.name: reportName
inputs.label: Report name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Report name without file extension. If not set, a default report name '%S_%Y%M%D_%T' will be used.

inputs.name: appendTimestamp
inputs.label: Append timestamp to file name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Attaches a timestamp in the format 'HHMMSS' to the report file name. E.g. the default output report file will be 'Report_093304.rxzlog'. If reports have the same name the previous report will be overwritten.

inputs.name: advancedCmdLine
inputs.label: Additional Command Line Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional command line arguments to pass to the test executable.

inputs.name: enableTestRail
inputs.label: Enable reporting to TestRail
inputs.helpMarkDown: If enabled test results will be published to a TestRail instance.

inputs.name: testRailConnection
inputs.label: TestRail Connection Service
inputs.helpMarkDown: TestRail connection service used for publishing the reports.

inputs.name: testRailRunID
inputs.label: Run ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: The identifier of an existing test run in TestRail to report test results to. Without this argument a new test run is created.

inputs.name: testRailRunName
inputs.label: Run Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Creates a new test run in TestRail with the specified name to report test results to. Without this argument the default name is used.
